description: Co-founded an AI-powered photo editing platform. Leading software architecture and development of computer vision algorithms for intelligent image enhancement and processing.
Researched and tested image processing methods to improve speed and accuracy of ML-based object detection and tracking. Contributed to research documentation and reviewed related scientific work.
Developed and optimized CNN-based models for intelligent CCTV surveillance, detecting object-specific events and potential property damage with custom rule-based triggers for real-time alerts.
Led a team of six to develop responsive, scalable web applications. Enhanced client satisfaction by 40% and improved code quality through automated testing and CI/CD integration.
